file.path: D:\TorrentDir\Enid Blyton E-Book Collection\Secret Seven\Secret Seven on the Trail - Enid Blyton.epub
file.name: Secret Seven on the Trail - Enid Blyton.epub

tika.dc.description:
Product Description

Something mysterious is going on at Tigger's Barn, and the Secret Seven are intrigued. Peter thinks it's all just gossip, but Jack isn't so sure when he overhears a strange conversation. Looks like the Seven are on the trail of another exciting adventure...

About the Author

Enid Blyton died in 1968 but remains one of the best-known and best-loved writers of children's stories. She is consistently voted a children's favourite in author polls. She has over 600 children's books to her credit, including the Famous Five series, the Secret Seven series, the Naughtiest Girl series (all Hodder) and the Malory Towers and St Clare's series (both available from Hodder on audio).
